biotools.summary:
A newly available database of an important family of phytophagous mites.

The Tenuipalpidae is one of the most important families of phytophagous mites. Several tenuipalpids species are considered pests in many crops around the world. They also are known as flat mites and false spider mites.

bioschemas.name: Tenuipalpidae
